name: Xenolasso (bugfix version)
description:
You're alone on a planet. Aliens surround you.

And they're adorable!

Run around the critters to get them stuck in your lasso. You can sell them for upgrades or hold onto them for "research." Either way, your boss isn't letting you blast off for home until you've found them all.

This 2D puzzle sidescroller was originally created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47, theme: Stuck in a loop. All art, music, and non-code assets were created from scratch by our team of seven. You can find the original jam submission here: https://daring-owl-studios.itch.io/xenolasso
